definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
(bird species of China) cackling goose (Branta hutchinsii)
Giant Wild Goose Pagoda in Xi'an

sentences.english: The content of phosphatide in anser eggs was higher than goose's significantly.
sentences.chinese: 大雁卵中磷脂含量明显低于鹅卵。

sentences.english: I saw a flight of geese headed south for the winter.
sentences.chinese: 我看到一群大雁南飞过冬去了。

sentences.english: Now you understand the story about Master Monk Xuanzang and why the Dayan Pagoda was built?
sentences.chinese: 这下你了解了玄奘大师的故事和大雁塔的来历了吧？

sentences.english: We were like the geese, blind, lost, perishing.
sentences.chinese: 我们就像大雁一样，盲目，迷失，麻木。

sentences.english: It's the wild geese's instinct to migrate to warm places every autumn.
sentences.chinese: 迁徙到温暖的地方，是大雁的常性。

sentences.english: Xuanzang built the pagoda in order to have a place for his Buddhist books.
sentences.chinese: 玄奘修建大雁塔是为了存放经书。

sentences.english: People always connect Xi'an with the Big Goose Pagoda and Terracotta Warriors and Horses.
sentences.chinese: 人们一提到西安就会联想到大雁塔和兵马俑。

sentences.english: I didn't know he designed the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 原来大雁塔是他设计的。

sentences.english: Discussion on the superiority in development of lignite gasification in Dayan Coal Industry Corp.
sentences.chinese: 大雁煤业公司发展褐煤气化的优势探讨。

sentences.english: It is the landmark of the ancient capital city - Xian.
sentences.chinese: 大雁塔是古都西安的标志建筑。

sentences.english: A couple of them had flown into his window, it seemed.
sentences.chinese: 似乎其中的一对大雁在飞行中撞到了窗户上。

sentences.english: Today, we took the kids to the local pond near my sister-in-law's to feed the geese.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们带着孩子们去嫂子家附近的池塘喂大雁。

sentences.english: The Wild Goose Pagoda was dimly visible.
As flight of wild geese flew into the afterglow, crying merrily all the way.
sentences.chinese: 一群大雁一边欢叫着一边飞向落日的余晖中。

sentences.english: What supports wild geese flying all the way to the south?
sentences.chinese: 大雁南飞，征途茫茫，是什么在支撑着它？

sentences.english: They've found the numbers to be high…bears, cougars, moose, elk etc.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现的数量很大，有熊，大雁等等。

definition: (bird species of China) swan goose (Anser cygnoides)
(bird species of China) little egret (Egretta garzetta)
(bird species of China) red-crowned crane (Grus japonensis)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) taiga bean goose (Anser fabalis)
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
